tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
As per one of my friend's suggestion we met Dr. Swarna Sree in Dec 2018 regarding infertility issue and explained about our earlier treatment history. In our eariler treatment, No doctor couldn't find the reason for infertility. Dr. Swarna sree has found the reason for infertility and started treatment.After one month we got positive result in pregnency test.No limits for our happiness at that moment.We are blessed with baby girl in Septeber 2019.This moment is after 7 years of our marriage life. No words to express our happiness.The complete delivery process was carried out very seamlessly and absolutely with no hassle.*** ******* ********* *********** ********** ** ******She is always polite,friendly. She listens to our questions, concerns and then clarifies the doubts with patiency.“Thank you very much for your excellent care and exceptional professional abilities!”. Thank you would be small word.Dr. Swarna sree, you are the delightful person you have made our life happy. We suggested to our friends and will suggest in future also. Thanks for support Mr. Venkat from admin team, who handled the insurance process. The support from doctors,staff and nurses made our stay at zoi as home.We had good experience with Zoi hospital,Somajiguda. Good luck and all the best for future endeavours of Zoi Hospital. 
Regards,
Pavithra & Mahesh.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
On 2nd may 2019 our first baby boy was delivered at our very own Zoi hospital somajiguda. I fall short of words to describe our entire experience with Zoi. We were seeing doctor swarna from the very beginning. Her superlative degree of experience and knowledge has helped us to imbibe the qualities that are generally required to be a parent. The amount of experience that she brings on the table is simply immense and vast. The complete delivery process was carried out very seamlessly and absolutely with no hassle. From every corner of the hospital I was guided things step by step. The articulating capacity of each individual associated with our pregnancy is outstanding. Thankyou would be a too small word for me to dust off the experience of us with Zoi. The one hospital I have seen where the doctor says c section will not be done since the path is fully functioning and favorable for a natural or normal delivery. Hats off to our lady in shining armour Dr swarna who led this really well and gave all of us a sigh of relief. 

My gratitude and appreciation will also remain for Mr venkat who handled my insurance process to be complete without any intervention of mine post signing the set of insurance documents. Mr venkat ensured that he managed the entire process so well that I had zero involvement. The support and level of knowledge Mr Venkat has is worth commendable !!!!  Lastly I would like to conclude saying that we have a very special relationship that has built over a period of time with zoi. A beautiful relationship which is filled with care,love,trust,dedication and commitment.

It is imperative for us to stand out and deliver superior results which Zoi has proved in my case and I am sure in other cases as well. Good luck and all the best Zoi hospital Somajiguda !! Way to go and many more to come.

Regards
Aniket & Barnali.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I take this opportunity to thank Dr. G. Swarna Sree, MBBS, MD - Obstetrics & Gynaecology and her team and all technicians and support staff for their excellent support and making us feel comfortable during the entire treatment duration.
She is an extremely professional surgeon who is very caring and sensitive. We were very comfortable discussing the problems/progress with her and she would always respond positively.
Dr. G. Swarna Sree Mam: You were very helpful and polite in all respects, and we are totally satisfied by the treatment.
“You are truly a remarkable doctor and professional that we respect and trust".
I completely recommend this doctor. she was also so extremely friendly and so willing to help. She is always friendly and patient, listens to any questions and concerns we may have and always takes the time to explain things to us. She is the best!!!
The procedure was explained very well to us before surgery and after the surgery by the Doctors and PRO team, Especially Mr Venkat Krishna Reddy. He did a great job and helped us a lot. 
Feel very cared for every visit. Thank you everyone for your care.
Thanks for co operation & support from all staff of nurses. The stay in hospital felt like a home stay.

Overall a very good experience...

I have delivered a baby boy on 4th May 2019 in zoi hospital somajiguda.truely speaking this is the very safest and comfort providing hospital.the staff and docters are very friendly.they has given me complete attention and care to me and my baby.... I'm feeling very proud to consult with zoi hospital.dr swarna sree mam and Bindu Priya.N mam has supported me and safety delivered a baby boy through c-section because of some circumstances.dr.nagarjuna is a very good pediatrician.i had a very good and memorable experience with zoi hospital.thank you so much for your caring treatment.

Dr.Swarna sree is friendly available all the time to share the medication and suggestions to her patients. We were witnessed the way she treat. *** ** *** ********* **** ******* ** *** ****** * Thankyou madam for your treatment to my wife.
she very experienced and friendly. she explains everything in detail. I would recommend her to my friends and family.

\"Good experience with the doctor she is always good. She was listing to the problems and she explained to me the problems. I know the doctor for a very long time I met her In Vivekananda hospital I am a regular patient to her. But then in the joy hospital, this was my first visit. The doctor's behavior is very good very cool and friendly. Hospital everything is good except for the reception they make us wait for a long time we patients have to stand in a line for the billing and for collecting the reports. There are only two persons in the reception at least they can have one more person in the reception and the pharmacy also whatever medicines we need almost all 50% of the medicines will be not available there. \r\n\

She is a not a doctor she always treats us like mom and sister and the hospital also a very good receiving and maintenance also super gud helping I weny for some granuloma problem everyone said that surgery compulsory when i consultant the swarna sree mam she completely check up and said its not a granuloma its right iliac fossa dont need surgery given nice proscription for me I really thank her to say complete wt iam suffering thank you mam

She is a not doctor , she is a mother
and M/s ZOI hospital is a good, treatment and staff also good

She is captive and explains properly everything available every time, got to know about from one of my colleagues, doctors behaviour was good I would like to recommend the doctor. I am satisfied with the doctor's treatment, when I booked an appointment doctor was not available but also they booked so I have to go to the hospital twice this kind of thing should improve, I thought it could be fine if she suggested some exercises as yoga classes.
